visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the following specifications: Chart type: spline, Chart title: 'Monthly Data Trends', Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the title and axis labels, with a font size of 14px. The x-axis should have a grid line color of light gray (#CCCCCC), and the y-axis should have a grid line color of dark gray (#666666). Data series: The series should include one series named 'Monthly Data' with the provided data. Custom colors: Use a gradient from light blue (#ADD8E6) to dark blue (#00008B) for the series. Additional configurations: Set the chart background to a light gray color (#F5F5F5), add a legend at the bottom of the chart, and set the chart margins to 50 pixels on all sides.
